name: RDG's BotBattle: The Prototype
description: RobodudeGames' BotBattle is a light strategy game prototype.  Build turrets to defend your base and build bases to send AI driven Robos at the enemy.  Expand your area of control with Nodes to control resources and gain the upper hand.  This is currently a prototype for the core mechanics of the game.  It will be updated periodically as new features are added such as but not limited to:  expanded maps, more tile types, and more Robo types.  I hope you enjoy coming up with interesting strategies.
